column1: # Light curves of Mira in 0.45-13.5 micron measured with images taken by
# the Himawari-8 meteorological satellite (converted to AB magnitudes; after binning).
#   "The Great Dimming of Betelgeuse seen by the Himawari-8 meteorological satellite"
#   1st column: Mean of observation dates in each bin in UTC (accuracy of 10 min).
#   2nd column: First observation date in each bin in UTC (accuracy of 10 min).
#   3rd column: Last observation date in each bin in UTC (accuracy of 10 min).
#   The others: AB magnitude of each band and its standard error (only for Bands 2 and 3).
